channel.title: Mass DC?
channel.description: For some reason, out of the blue, my server just kicks everyone off. What could be causing this? I have a 562 RS2HD base and I'm thinking that the cause might be the MySQL connection I have? Or maybe is it my VPS? I only use this much of RAM if this has anything to do with it: 136.32 MB of 1.25 GB Used I set my maximum ram usage to 1.25 gb "-Xmx1250m" I have my sql connection on the server startup and then run various query's such as hiscores update, voting, and donation which are all on a 60 second timer I believe and I never close and reopen the connection unless the server has a restart and when a player levels up it also runs a query for an adventure log also when a player kills another player it runs a query to update adventures log. Does anyone know what my problem is?

item.title: Mass DC?
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

For some reason, out of the blue, my server just kicks everyone off. What could be causing this? I have a 562 RS2HD base and I’m thinking that the cause might be the MySQL connection I have? Or maybe is it my VPS? I only use this much of RAM if this has anything to do with it: 136.32 MB of 1.25 GB Used I set my maximum ram usage to 1.25 gb “-Xmx1250m” I have my sql connection on the server startup and then run various query’s such as hiscores update, voting, and donation which are all on a 60 second timer I believe and I never close and reopen the connection unless the server has a restart and when a player levels up it also runs a query for an adventure log also when a player kills another player it runs a query to update adventures log. Does anyone know what my problem is?

Read full topic
